Sentencas: Cerium incorporated barium zirconate nano-ceramics BaZr1-xCexO3-x/2 were fabricated by eco-friendly green combustion using honey as a fuel.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and dielectric investigations of cerium doped barium zirconate (BaZrO3) nano-ceramics produced via green synthesis: Probable candidate for solid oxide fuel cells and microwave applications

Sentencas: FTIR spectra evidenced a prominent band between 400 and 700 cm-1 characteristics of ABO3 perovskites.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and dielectric investigations of cerium doped barium zirconate (BaZrO3) nano-ceramics produced via green synthesis: Probable candidate for solid oxide fuel cells and microwave applications

Sentencas: The bond-length (r) of Zr-O bond is extended through doping of Ce ions.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and dielectric investigations of cerium doped barium zirconate (BaZrO3) nano-ceramics produced via green synthesis: Probable candidate for solid oxide fuel cells and microwave applications

Sentencas: Consequently, the communication among Zr and O bond is weakened.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and dielectric investigations of cerium doped barium zirconate (BaZrO3) nano-ceramics produced via green synthesis: Probable candidate for solid oxide fuel cells and microwave applications

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity rises with temperature, demonstrating that BaZr1-xCexO3-x/2 exhibits ionic and/or electron-hole conduction.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and dielectric investigations of cerium doped barium zirconate (BaZrO3) nano-ceramics produced via green synthesis: Probable candidate for solid oxide fuel cells and microwave applications

Sentencas: The conductivity is observed to enhance with the Ce3+ concentration.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and dielectric investigations of cerium doped barium zirconate (BaZrO3) nano-ceramics produced via green synthesis: Probable candidate for solid oxide fuel cells and microwave applications

Sentencas: At 850 C, the solid x = 0.10 exhibits enhanced conductivity of 0.0190 S/cm than that of pristine BaZrO3 (0.010 S/cm).
Titulo: Structural, electrical and dielectric investigations of cerium doped barium zirconate (BaZrO3) nano-ceramics produced via green synthesis: Probable candidate for solid oxide fuel cells and microwave applications

Sentencas: The increasing trend of conductivity may be due to decreased grain boundary resistance effect and generation of oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and dielectric investigations of cerium doped barium zirconate (BaZrO3) nano-ceramics produced via green synthesis: Probable candidate for solid oxide fuel cells and microwave applications

Sentencas: Dielectric behaviour shows slight frequency dependence performance, the dielectric constant was high (epsilon = 35-45) in lower frequency region.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and dielectric investigations of cerium doped barium zirconate (BaZrO3) nano-ceramics produced via green synthesis: Probable candidate for solid oxide fuel cells and microwave applications

Sentencas: The dielectric constant declines on enhancing Ce-content which can be explained on the Maxwell-Wagner model.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and dielectric investigations of cerium doped barium zirconate (BaZrO3) nano-ceramics produced via green synthesis: Probable candidate for solid oxide fuel cells and microwave applications
